title: Wrongly banned
body: I tried logging in today to see that I was permanently banned and I think this must have been a mistake, I don't play regularly and I wanted to get back into it, my last login was 21 days ago and it was a simple aram match. no leaving, cursing or any negative sport. I have been playing this game going on 6 years and invested time and a lot of money into this if someone can give me an answer that would be great.

replies.body: It doesn't look like you're actually banned. Our system noticed some pretty shifty activity, so we wanted to make sure that only the original creator had access to the account. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to get everything fixed up.
Unfortunatly i am still permanently suspended. Ca you be a broporo and help me

Did you submit a ticket yet? I'm looking at this account right now, and this account is **not** banned. Were you talking about a different account? You may just be using the wrong password or something, what error do you see exactly?
Still having the same issue, I have sent out a ticket prior to making this post as well. Help!
